/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen in the distance, their colors muted against the vibrant backdrop. The image is taken from a low angle, making the trees and bushes appear taller and more imposing. The overall scene is a harmonious blend of man-made structures and natural beauty.
